titles.title: Battery Material Processing and Component Manufacturing Act of 2021
Battery Material Processing and Component Manufacturing Act of 2021
A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to establish a battery material processing grant program and a battery manufacturing and recycling grant program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Battery Material Processing and Component Manufacturing Act of 2021
This bill requires the Department of Energy to establish grant programs to support, enhance, and sustain a domestic supply chain for batteries, including grants to facilities for processing, manufacturing, and recycling batteries.
